Lord of Stone Hedge05286401spdni89uapzkqxqp2l5h9ns0bo2t1489052014-06-25T22:56:23ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603'''The Lord of Stone Hedge''' is a title held by the ruler of the castle [[Stone Hedge]] and its surrounding lands. It is traditionally held by the head of [[House Bracken]], vassals of [[House Tully]] of [[Riverrun]]. The current Lord of Stone Hedge is [[Jonos Bracken]].
